snippet: SungEun Grace Lee, a terminally ill woman whose parents went to court to keep her alive, has now decided she wants to live out the rest of her life.
abstract: Terminally ill Queens woman SungEun Grace Lee, who won a court battle against her parents to allow a hospital to disconnect a breathing tube, has decided that she wants to remain on life support.
lead_paragraph: SungEun Grace Lee, a terminally ill woman whose parents went to court to keep her alive, has now decided she wants to live out the rest of her life.

headline.seo: SungEun Grace Lee Changes Her Mind and Decides to Stay on Life Support
headline.main: Changing Her Mind, a Queens Woman Decides to Remain on Life Support
headline.print_headline: Changing Mind, a Queens Woman Decides to Remain on Life Support
